Attack: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Drink - Use up to 2 abilities next night. Day ability. 1 use, gain a use for each non Neutral (except NK) killed.
Party - Force someone to target you.
Invite - Target a player. They will learn that you are the Party Host. 1 use, gain 1 more for each non Neutral (except NK) killed.
